**Maximum Virtual Private Servers LLC is a Washington State registered LLC. We have been in business since February 2013.**

Quick AUP: We do not allow camfrog, virtual currency mining, open proxy's, TOR exit nodes.  Or Digital currency mining. 


**KVM64, $0.25 First Month! enter code VALENTINES** ([order](https://maximumvps.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=9))

* 1 Core
* 64 MB RAM
* 5 GB HDD
* 56 GB Traffic
* 1 Gbps Port
* 1 IPv4 address
* IPv6 on request
* RDNS on request
* DNS hosting 25 domains 100 records each


Need more IPv4 addresses, traffic, HDD space or CPU cores? Contact us!

**Operating systems**

Our KVM64 plan is low-RAM and only support a few operating systems, such as:

* Debian 6 (manually upgradeable to Debian 7)
* DSL
* Tiny Core
* Alpine
* Austrumi

Others are available as well, but install and test at your own risk. 

**Test files and IPs:** These can be found at our [looking glass](http://lg.maximumvps.net/) page, along with other networking testing utilities.

**Location:** Our colocated owned nodes are located at [Quadranet](http://quadranet.com/) (_not_ via ColoCrossing) at their Los Angeles, California datacenter. Their network provides native IPv6 connectivity (no tunnelling), and great connectivity to Asia and Australia. Providers include nLayer, Tiscali/Inteliquent, PCCW/BTN, Equinix LAIIX Any2Exchange, Host.net, HiNet Taiwan, and ChinaUnicom Direct.

**Our current node specifications:** Dual L5420, 16GB RAM, 4 x 1TB WD RE drives, Adaptec 3405 RAID with BBU
